name: 12 Days to Xmas - iPad Edition
description:
*** BRAND NEW UPDATE Version 1.3 ***

Just in time for the holidays!

Help Santa save Christmas from the Naughty Helper Elves that have stolen all of the gifts! On each level of the game you will gather gifts, score points, and save Christmas for all of the good little girls and boys of the world.

Perfect fun for all of the family!

***There are no AD's in this version of the game.***

Also available on iPhone!
